::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer stares at the pod. He was getting a bit ticked that it was just 
sitting there, not doing anything. Suddenly, a thought occurs to DevilDuer. 
WHat if the bot was programmed a Maximal! It would open fire on him!

He bolts over to the pod, tapping the small screen. He knew it! It was 
Maximal...

He reaches into a compartment, taking out a reprogramming chip. He placed it 
on the screen of the pod, and began the reprogramming procedure. He didn't 
know too much about this, but he figured he could get by well enough to turn 
the bot into a loyal Alliance member.
